metadata.title: CVE-2015-4507 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The SavedStacks class in the JavaScript implementation in Mozilla Firefoxbefore 41.0, when the Debugger API is enabled, allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (getSlotRef assertion failure and applicationexit) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted web site.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4507` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 41.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 41.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 41.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 41.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '41.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
